alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 9:11AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cass and southeastern Barnes Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 910 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fingal, or 12 miles southeast of Valley City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fingal around 920 AM CDT. Oriska around 930 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tower City and Buffalo. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 296 and 320. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
